reviewText: I really Like season 2 BBW so I had to buy the season all I need is season 4 for my collection.

I love the season finale.  That is why I bought it.  Very Interesting.  I love the showdown with Tammi and Evelyn.
This was great. I would like to see Basketball Wives LA seasons on Prime as well really soon thanks Amazon.
Lots of cattiness. If you like women arguing all the time then this series is for you. I will say that they are beautiful women. I just wish that they were better role models.
This is always good to c its never ended drama all the time wow never a dull moment a must buy

I heard good things about this show after season 3 already aired and I wanted to get caught up before season 4 aired so I purchased this season here on Amazon.  I loved watching this season in it's entirety without commercial interuption and no flaws. Enjoy
